quoteText: “Crawls,” “scrapes,” or “spiders” any page, data or portion of or relating to the Services or Content (through use of manual or automated means).
title: Users cannot scrape the website of the service

tosdr.case: Users cannot scrape the website of the service
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use state, "You represent, warrant, and agree that you will not contribute any Submission that, or otherwise use the Services or interact with the Services in a manner that . . . "Crawls," "scrapes," or "spiders" any page, data or portion of or relating to the Services or Content (through use of manual or automated means)."
